vehicles.description: Tesla Model S is a luxury electric sedan offering exceptional performance and long-range capability.

key_features.title: Full Self-Driving Capability
key_features.description: Autopilot with Full Self-Driving Capability for a semi-autonomous driving experience.

key_features.title: Innovative Steering Design
key_features.description: Yoke steering wheel enhances the driving experience with futuristic controls.

key_features.title: Cinematic Display
key_features.description: 17-inch cinematic touchscreen for immersive entertainment and navigation.

key_features.title: Premium Interior
key_features.description: Upgraded premium interior with advanced HEPA filtration for clean air.

key_features.title: Gaming on the Go
key_features.description: Wireless gaming capability with up to 10 teraflops of processing power.

vehicles.description: Tesla Model 3 is a compact electric sedan designed for affordability without compromising on performance.

key_features.title: Full Self-Driving Capability
key_features.description: Available as an option for enhanced autonomous driving.

key_features.title: Minimalist Interior
key_features.description: Interior features a 15-inch touchscreen with a simple and modern design.

key_features.title: Over-the-Air Software Updates
key_features.description: Receive software improvements and new features remotely, over the air.

key_features.title: Panoramic Glass Roof
key_features.description: Enjoy a more open and airy experience with a panoramic glass roof.

key_features.title: Energy Efficiency
key_features.description: Designed for maximum energy efficiency to help extend driving range.

vehicles.description: Tesla Model X is a premium SUV with a spacious interior and Falcon Wing doors for style and utility.

key_features.title: Falcon Wing Doors
key_features.description: Easily access the rear seats with Falcon Wing doors that open upward.

key_features.title: Seating for 7
key_features.description: Spacious cabin with seating for up to 7 passengers.

key_features.title: Full Self-Driving
key_features.description: Autopilot with Full Self-Driving capability for an autonomous experience.

key_features.title: Tri-Zone Climate Control
key_features.description: Manage temperatures for three distinct zones in the vehicle.

key_features.title: Premium Audio System
key_features.description: Enjoy an immersive sound experience with a premium sound system.

vehicles.description: Tesla Model Y is a versatile electric SUV offering practicality, space, and Teslaâ€™s iconic performance.

key_features.title: Seating for 7
key_features.description: Spacious interior offers seating for up to 7 passengers.

key_features.title: Autopilot with Full Self-Driving
key_features.description: Available self-driving technology that assists with driving and navigation.

key_features.title: Intuitive Touchscreen
key_features.description: 15-inch touchscreen for easy access to all vehicle controls and entertainment.

key_features.title: Panoramic Glass Roof
key_features.description: Gives the cabin an airy feel with an expansive view of the sky.

key_features.title: Wireless Charging
key_features.description: Built-in wireless charging for your devices during your journey.

vehicles.description: Tesla Cybertruck is a futuristic electric pickup truck with unmatched durability and performance.

key_features.title: Exoskeleton
key_features.description: Made of Ultra-Hard 30X Cold-Rolled stainless steel for maximum strength.

key_features.title: Vault-Like Storage
key_features.description: Covered storage with 100 cubic feet of space for cargo and equipment.

key_features.title: Adaptive Air Suspension
key_features.description: Customize the truck's ground clearance with adjustable air suspension.

key_features.title: Bullet-Resistant Windows
key_features.description: Windows are designed to withstand significant impact and breakage.

key_features.title: Towing Capacity
key_features.description: Capable of towing up to 6,500 pounds for heavy-duty hauling.

vehicles.description: The Tesla Roadster redefines speed and luxury, delivering record-breaking acceleration and range.

key_features.title: Removable Glass Roof
key_features.description: Enjoy an open-top experience with a removable glass roof.

key_features.title: Torque Vectoring
key_features.description: All-wheel drive with torque vectoring for maximum traction and control.

key_features.title: Unmatched Acceleration
key_features.description: Record-breaking acceleration of under 2 seconds for a thrilling driving experience.

key_features.title: Enhanced Aerodynamics
key_features.description: Aerodynamic design for maximum speed and efficiency.

key_features.title: State-of-the-Art Infotainment
key_features.description: Cutting-edge infotainment system for a modern and connected driving experience.
